src:
Duel Liverpool vs Manchester City Tidak Krusial Dalam Perburuan Gelar Juara EPL
04 Nov 2019, 06:59 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Kyle Walker meyakini duel antara Liverpool vs Manchester City di matchday 12 nanti tak akan jadi penentu tim mana yang bakal juara Premier League.
Laga big match akan tersaji di Anfield pada pekan ke-12 Premier League pada 10 November 2019 mendatang. Liverpool, sang pemuncak klasemen, akan menjamu Man City.
Keduanya sudah bersaing ketat untuk jadi juara liga sejak musim lalu. Namun saat itu Manchester City berhasil menang.
Kini Liverpool yang dianggap berpeluang besar jadi juara liga. Sebab mereka belum pernah kalah dari 11 laga dan sekarang mengoleksi 31 poin.
Sementara itu Manchester City sudah kalah dua kali dan imbang sekali. Sekarang mereka berada di peringkat kedua dan tertinggal enam poin dari Liverpool.
text:
Liverpool vs Manchester City duel is not crucial in the hunt for EPL championship title
Nov 04 2019, 06:59 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Kyle Walker believes the duel between Liverpool vs Manchester City on Matchday 12 will not be deciding which team will be the Premier League champion.
Big match match will be presented at Anfield in the 12th week of the Premier League on 10 November 2019. Liverpool, the top of the table, will host Man City.
Both have been competing to be league champions since last season. But at that time Manchester City managed to win.
Now Liverpool are considered to have the greatest chance of becoming league champions. Because they have never lost in 11 matches and now collect 31 points.
Meanwhile Manchester City have lost twice and drawn once. Now they are ranked second and six points behind Liverpool.
